statements: SELECT * FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, math_score FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE academic_year = 2021;
SELECT student_id, first_name, reading_score FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE science_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE math_score > reading_score AND reading_score > science_score;
SELECT AVG(math_score) AS average_math_score, AVG(reading_score) AS average_reading_score FROM StudentPerformanceData;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE math_score > 80 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT student_id, first_name, math_score FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE academic_year = 2021 ORDER BY math_score DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, reading_score FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE reading_score >= 75 ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name ASC
SELECT student_id, academic_year, science_score FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE science_score < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformanceData WHERE math_score >= 70 AND reading_score >= 70 AND science_score >= 70 ORDER BY academic_year ASC, student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade, subject FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, student_name, performance_score FROM students ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_id FROM courses WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, subject FROM students WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, student_name, performance_score, grade FROM students WHERE subject = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.teacher_id WHERE courses.start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND courses.end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, performance_score FROM students WHERE grade >= 80 AND subject IN ('Science', 'History') ORDER BY grade DESC, performance_score ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT student_id, student_name, subject, grade FROM students WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 85 ORDER BY subject, grade DESC, student_name ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, department FROM teachers;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM students INNER JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT teacher_name, department, course_name FROM teachers INNER JOIN courses ON teachers.teacher_id = courses.teacher_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE course_id = 1 AND grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM teachers LEFT JOIN courses ON teachers.teacher_id = courses.teacher_id GROUP BY teacher_name
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id;
SELECT review_date, performance_rating FROM performance_review WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(course_description) > 0;

SELECT student_name, course_name, performance_rating FROM students INNER JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id INNER JOIN performance_review ON students.student_id = performance_review.student_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;

SELECT student_name, course_name, review_date FROM students INNER JOIN student_courses ON students.student_id = student_courses.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON student_courses.course_id = courses.course_id INNER JOIN performance_review ON students.student_id = performance_review.student_id WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT subject_name, subject_description FROM subjects WHERE subject_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, class_name, final_score FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id WHERE final_score >= 80;

SELECT subject_name, AVG(quiz_score) AS avg_quiz_score FROM subjects s JOIN classes c ON s.subject_id = c.class_id JOIN enrollments e ON c.class_id = e.class_id JOIN grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id GROUP BY subject_name;

SELECT student_name, class_name, quiz_score, final_score FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id WHERE quiz_score > 80 AND final_score < 90 ORDER BY student_name DESC, final_score ASC;
